text: U tekh, kto sporit o znameniyakh i svidetel'stvakh Allakha bez dokazatel'stv i sily, dannykh im Allakhom Velikim, serdtsa okhvacheny gordyney, kotoraya sbivayet ikh s puti istiny, i oni ne dostignut svoikh tseley. Prosi (o Mukhammad!) zashchity u Allakha! Poistine, On - Vseslyshashchiy i Vsevidyashchiy
